Submodules¶

API.app module¶

API.classify module¶

Module based upon https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/blob/master/examples/classification/example.py

API.classify.classify(net, transformer, image_files, labels_file=None, batch_size=None)¶

Classify some images against a Caffe model and returns the results

Parameters:
  • net (caffe.Net) – A caffe.Net.
  • transformer (caffe.io.Transformer) – A caffe.io.Transformer.
  • image_files (List) – List of paths to images.
  • labels_file (str, optional) – Path to a .txt file.
  • batch_size (int, optional) – How many images can be processed at once. (a high value may result in out-of-memory errors)
Returns:

A list of classification results.
Return type:

List
API.classify.forward_pass(images, net, transformer, batch_size=None)¶

Returns scores for each image as an np.ndarray (nImages x nClasses)

Parameters:
  • images (List) – A list of np.ndarrays.
  • net (caffe.Net) – A caffe.Net.
  • transformer (caffe.io.Transformer) – A caffe.io.Transformer.
  • batch_size (int, optional) – How many images can be processed at once. (a high value may result in out-of-memory errors)
Returns:

Scores for each image. (nImages x nClasses)
Return type:

np.ndarray
API.classify.get_net(caffemodel, deploy_file, use_gpu=False)¶

Returns an instance of caffe.Net

Parameters:
  • caffemodel (str) – Path to a .caffemodel file.
  • deploy_file (str) – Path to a .prototxt file.
  • use_gpu (bool, optional) – If True, use the GPU for inference.
Returns:

The caffemodel net.
Return type:

caffe.Net
API.classify.get_transformer(deploy_file, mean_file=None)¶

Returns an instance of caffe.io.Transformer

Parameters:
  • deploy_file (str) – path to a .prototxt file.
  • mean_file (str, optional) – path to a .binaryproto file.
Returns:

The caffemodel transformer.
Return type:

caffe.io.Transformer
API.classify.load_image(path, height, width, mode='RGB')¶

Load an image from disk.

Parameters:
  • path (str) – Path to an image on disk.
  • width (int) – Resize dimension.
  • height (int) – Resize dimension.
  • mode (str, optional) – The PIL mode that the image should be converted to. (RGB for color or L for grayscale)
Returns:

(channels x width x height)
Return type:

np.ndarray
API.classify.read_labels(labels_file)¶

Returns a list of strings

Parameters:labels_file (str) – Path to a .txt file
